data.name: Dreamfall Chapters: The Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The award-winning original soundtrack to Dreamfall Chapters: The Final Cut is a stirring musical journey through the twin worlds of science and magic, accompanying an episodic adventure game now collected in a new and complete special edition.

The extended and remastered soundtrack features new and original music from Dreamfall Chapters: The Final Cut, and is available for the first time on Steam.

Track list:
01 - The House of All Worlds - Simon Poole
02 - Reborn - Simon Poole
03 - Prologue - Simon Poole
04 - Return to the Hospital Room - Simon Poole
05 - Storytime - Simon Poole
06 - Storytime Conversations - Simon Poole
07 - The Azadi - Simon Poole
08 - A Song for Kian - Simon Poole
09 - Friar's Keep - Simon Poole
10 - Therapy - Simon Poole
11 - Europolis - Simon Poole
12 - Saga - Simon Poole
13 - Announcement Trailer - Simon Poole
14 - A Room with a View - Simon Poole
15 - Rebels - Simon Poole
16 - Fever Dreams - Simon Poole
17 - The Enclave - Simon Poole
18 - Marcuria by Night - Simon Poole
19 - The Raid - Simon Poole
20 - Abnaxus - Simon Poole
21 - Propast Blowback - Simon Poole
22 - Realms - Simon Poole
23 - Through the Looking Glass - Simon Poole
24 - Southwards - Simon Poole
25 - The Yaga - Simon Poole
26 - Attack on the Enclave - Simon Poole
27 - Revelations - Simon Poole
28 - The Purple Mountains - Simon Poole
29 - Bird on a Search - Simon Poole
30 - The Void - Simon Poole
31 - A Farewell to Wonkers - Simon Poole
32 - The Prophet - Simon Poole
33 - Morning in Marcuria - Simon Poole
34 - The Dream Vortex - Simon Poole
35 - Mumbai Underground - Simon Poole
36 - The Ceremony Begins - Simon Poole
37 - Breaking Point - Simon Poole
38 - Night Falls on Marcuria - Simon Poole
39 - The Undreaming Is Unchained - Simon Poole
40 - Shifts - Simon Poole
41 - Dreaming Shards - Simon Poole
42 - The Longest Journey Home - Simon Poole
43 - Rebel-Rousing - Simon Poole
44 - Payback - Simon Poole
45 - Dreaming and Undreaming - Simon Poole
46 - Rush-Redux - Ingvild Hasund
47 - Journey's End - Simon Poole
48 - End Titles - Simon Poole

(You'll find MP3 and FLAC encoded files in you Steam directory upon purchase: "...Steam\steamapps\common\Dreamfall Chapters\Original Soundtrack")

Based in Norway, Simon Poole is an award winning composer, sound designer, producer, and general audio junkie specialising in interactive audio. A graduate of The Liverpool Institute of Performing Arts, Simon is Audio Director at Red Thread Games, and has many critically acclaimed video game titles under his belt, including Dreamfall: The Longest Journey, Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures, The Secret World, Lego Minifigures Online, The Park, and Dreamfall Chapters.

data.short_description: Acclaimed composer Simon Poole's complete original remastered and award-winning soundtrack to Dreamfall Chapters: The Final Cut.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core i5 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia card with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.9 Mavericks or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 21 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Quad Core i5 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia card with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 21 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0 or above
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0 or above
  • Processor: Quad Core i5 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia card with 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
